posts.post_content:
FOR SALE: Pair of T206 cards. Downey with Piedmont 350 back and Gasper with tolstoi back. Gasper appears to have been trimmed with some upper paper loss on the back of the card. GASPER SOLD. Paypal.

Any questions let me know. Thanks, Tom.

Downey is available for $20.00 shipped with tracking. Paypal.

It has a light horizontal crease in center of card. At some point someone wrote lightly in pencil on the back of the card "1-". Assuming it was for sale for a $1.00.

Any questions let me know. Thx
